member.name: T:DeviceId.Windows.Wmi.Components.WmiMacAddressDeviceIdComponent
member.summary: An implementation of that uses the MAC Address of the PC. This improves upon the basic by using WMI to get better information from either MSFT_NetAdapter or Win32_NetworkAdapter.
